verses.verse: In the <S%H8147>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1867>Darius<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, in the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, in the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, came the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H2292>Haggai<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> unto <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7597>Shealtiel<s%>, <S%H6346>governor<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3087>Josedech<s%>, the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, by: Heb. by the hand of governor: or, captain

Thus <S%H559>speaketh<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, This <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>say<s%>, The <S%H6256>time<s%> is not <S%H935>come<s%>, the <S%H6256>time<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD'S<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> should be <S%H1129>built<s%>.
Then came the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H2292>Haggai<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
Is it <S%H6256>time<s%> for you, O ye, to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in your <S%H5603>cieled<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%>, and this <S%H1004>house<s%> lie <S%H2720>waste<s%>?
Now therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; <S%H7760>Consider<s%> <S%H3824><s%> your <S%H1870>ways<s%>. Consider: Heb. Set your heart on your ways

Ye have <S%H2232>sown<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%>, and <S%H935>bring<s%> in <S%H4592>little<s%>; ye <S%H398>eat<s%>, but ye have not <S%H7654>enough<s%>; ye <S%H8354>drink<s%>, but ye are not filled with <S%H7937>drink<s%>; ye <S%H3847>clothe<s%> you, but there is none <S%H2527>warm<s%>; and he that earneth <S%H7936>wages<s%> earneth <S%H7936>wages<s%> to put it into a <S%H6872>bag<s%> with <S%H5344>holes<s%>. with holes: Heb. pierced through
Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; <S%H7760>Consider<s%> <S%H3824><s%> your <S%H1870>ways<s%>. Consider: Heb. Set your heart on your ways

Go <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, and <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>, and <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%>; and I will take <S%H7521>pleasure<s%> in it, and I will be <S%H3513>glorified<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Ye <S%H6437>looked<s%> for <S%H7235>much<s%>, and, lo, it came to <S%H4592>little<s%>; and when ye <S%H935>brought<s%> it <S%H1004>home<s%>, I did <S%H5301>blow<s%> upon it. Why? <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>. <S%H3282>Because<s%> of mine <S%H1004>house<s%> that is <S%H2720>waste<s%>, and ye <S%H7323>run<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> unto his own <S%H1004>house<s%>. blow: or, blow it away
Therefore the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> over you is <S%H3607>stayed<s%> from <S%H2919>dew<s%>, and the <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H3607>stayed<s%> from her <S%H2981>fruit<s%>.

And I <S%H7121>called<s%> for a <S%H2721>drought<s%> upon the <S%H776>land<s%>, and upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and upon the <S%H1715>corn<s%>, and upon the new <S%H8492>wine<s%>, and upon the <S%H3323>oil<s%>, and upon that which the <S%H127>ground<s%> bringeth <S%H3318>forth<s%>, and upon <S%H120>men<s%>, and upon <S%H929>cattle<s%>, and upon all the <S%H3018>labour<s%> of the <S%H3709>hands<s%>.

Then <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7597>Shealtiel<s%>, and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3087>Josedech<s%>, the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%>, with all the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>, and the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2292>Haggai<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H7971>sent<s%> him, and the <S%H5971>people<s%> did <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Then <S%H559>spake<s%> <S%H2292>Haggai<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD'S<s%> <S%H4397>messenger<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD'S<s%> <S%H4400>message<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, I am with you, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> stirred <S%H5782>up<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7597>Shealtiel<s%>, <S%H6346>governor<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3087>Josedech<s%>, the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of all the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>; and they <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, their <S%H430>God<s%>,

In the <S%H702>four<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, in the <S%H8147>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1867>Darius<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>.
